objects.name: Tank
objects.description: A customizable tank with attributes like wraps, decals, and stickers.
objects.special_rules: Can have one wrap applied at a time. Decals and stickers may have positional constraints.

objects.name: Wrap
objects.description: A decorative layer that can be applied to a tank.
objects.special_rules: Only one wrap can be applied at a time.

objects.name: Decal
objects.description: A decorative element that can be applied to a tank.

objects.name: Sticker
objects.description: A decorative element that can be applied to a tank.

objects.name: Gold
objects.description: Standard in-game currency used for transactions.

objects.name: Diamond
objects.description: Premium in-game currency used for high-value transactions.

systems.name: Garage Customization System
systems.description: System allowing players to customize their tanks with wraps, decals, and stickers.
systems.mechanics: Players select wraps, decals, or stickers from lists of owned and unowned items. Changes are previewed on a 3D model.
systems.objectives: Enhance player engagement through customization options.
interactions: Players can preview changes before applying them.
Real-time updates visible to party members if the displayed tank matches the customized one.

systems.name: Currency Management System
systems.description: System managing in-game currencies (Gold and Diamond).
systems.mechanics: Players use Gold and Diamond to purchase wraps, decals, and stickers.
systems.objectives: Provide a tiered economic system to gate premium customizations.
interactions: Insufficient funds trigger notifications and optional redirection to the shop.

logic_rules.description: Only one wrap can be applied to a tank at any given time.
logic_rules.trigger: Player attempts to apply multiple wraps simultaneously.
logic_rules.effect: The system prevents application of more than one wrap.

logic_rules.description: Changes to the displayed tank are visible to party members in real-time under specific conditions.
logic_rules.trigger: Player applies decor matching the displayed tank outside Home.
logic_rules.effect: Party members see the updated tank in real-time.

logic_rules.description: Players must confirm purchases when attempting to apply unowned decor.
logic_rules.trigger: Player selects an unowned wrap, decal, or sticker and clicks 'Apply Decor'.
logic_rules.effect: A confirmation dialog appears; insufficient funds trigger additional notifications.

requirements.title: Clear Interaction Design
requirements.description: Ensure all UI interactions are intuitive and clearly understood by players.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Players can easily navigate and understand the customization interface without external guidance.

requirements.title: Real-Time Synchronization
requirements.description: Implement real-time updates for party members viewing the same tank.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Changes made by one player are immediately visible to others in the same party under specified conditions.

requirements.title: Currency Integration
requirements.description: Integrate Gold and Diamond currencies into the customization system.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Players can use both currencies to purchase wraps, decals, and stickers seamlessly.
